head.supplied: October 21st [186]3 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ Your letter of the 16th Inst was laid before the Council of the Acclimatisation Society yesterday, but direct action on the matter was postponed until next Tuesday in or...

div.p: No. 63/792, unit 3, p. 220, VPRS 2225 outward letterpress copy books, Acclimatisation Society of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Your letter of the 16th Inst was laid before the Council of the Acclimatisation Society yesterday, but direct action on the matter was postponed until next Tuesday in order that in the meantime Dr Mueller may learn how many swans he has at the Botanic Gardens. I will duly report the determinations.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
